p:
We used a Bayesian discrete phylogeographic approach with a MCMC length of 300 million steps in BEAST v1.8.4, sampling every 30000th step, to reconstruct the spatial dynamics of HIV-1 for the identified large clusters
41, 48 . Effective population sizes through time was inferred using the Bayesian Skygrid coalescent model
49 . Growth rates were estimated using the parametric exponential growth rate coalescent model
50, 51 .
